name: The Forbidden Smooch
description:
After years of exploration, one day you accidentally found a temple to a Goddess. Is this the day you finally get your promised smooch?

Best 4 challenges to bring 4 sacrifices gifts to summon smooch a Goddess. Smooch may or may not be included. Be careful, you are not alone in this temple.

Takes about ~1h to complete. I made this game as part of a challenge from a friend to make a "Rom-Com Horror" game in ~2 days.
